Compiling OpenMesh

Tested compilers

OpenMesh has been tested sucessfully for the following operating systems / compilers:

Linux gcc 3.x
gcc 4.0.x
gcc 4.1.x

Windows Microsoft VisualC++ .NET 2002
Microsoft VisualC++ .NET 2003

MacOS X
(Panther and Tiger)		gcc 3.3
gcc 4.0

Unix

At the moment you should use our tool acgmake to compile OpenMesh. See the acgmake documentation for installation/configuration hints.

Windows

For Microsoft Visual C++ .NET 2003, you can use the predefined solution file Win/msvc7/OpenMesh.sln.
